content.rendered:
Striving to deliver every project on-time and on-budget

 

When you send an invitation to tender, you’re looking for a contractor that can provide you with the most competitive pricing for the job at hand.

While Eden might not always come out as the most lucrative option on first look, unlike other contractors, we’ve proved time and again that we can bring projects on-time and on-budget, saving our clients thousands in delays and unexpected fees through accurate costings and value engineering. This often makes us the most cost-effective option for clients.

We’ve worked on projects ranging from £10,000 to £3million, and have experience competitively and accurately pricing jobs within this range to ensure we give our clients a realistic expectation of costs from the very start.

The price we say is the price you pay*

Unlike other building contractors in the industry, we give a price and stick to it. 100% of our projects are completed on-time and on-budget. You can learn more about how we achieve this here.

* Provided there is no variation from the agreed project scope after the contract is drawn up

Key stats:
